About

Tabli was developed by me, Antony Courtney, as a side project.
I'm an independent Computer Scientist and Software Developer based in San Francisco.
You can find me on the web at antonycourtney.com, or on Twitter as @antonycourtney.

Contact

I welcome your feedback on Tabli!
Please send feedback, questions, suggestions, and bug reports to

tabli-feedback@antonycourtney.com

If you are a developer, please feel free to also browse the source and follow the project on github.

Mailing List

No spam. Strictly for Tabli-related announcements.

Your email will never be used for third party advertising and will not be sold, shared or disclosed to anyone.
